Articles.Content:
I keep getting kern protection failures during my launches. This is the data in the crash report. I'm on a newish macbook pro, running Yosemite. I have the most recent KSP build.

Process:               KSP [1944]
Path:                  /Applications/KSP_osx/KSP.app/Contents/MacOS/KSP
Identifier:            unity.Squad.Kerbal Space Program
Version:               Unity Player version 4.6.4f1 (4.6.4f1)
Code Type:             X86 (Native)
Parent Process:        ??? [1]
Responsible:           KSP [1944]
User ID:               501

Date/Time:             2015-12-11 22:29:58.557 -0600
OS Version:            Mac OS X 10.10.5 (14F1021)
Report Version:        11
Anonymous UUID:        28741B23-6DF8-25AF-5249-2A7C2982849A


Time Awake Since Boot: 3300 seconds

Crashed Thread:        0  Dispatch queue: com.apple.main-thread

Exception Type:        EXC_BAD_ACCESS (SIGSEGV)
Exception Codes:       KERN_PROTECTION_FAILURE at 0x00000000bf7ffffc

Is there a way to fix this. It's really annoying.

Hi there!

Just got across your post recently as it happens to me as well on random occasions. Also differs in time span. 

At first I've been frightened by Dr. Google fearing that internal overheating could cause such errors. But then I came across this site:

http://www.thexlab.com/faqs/kernelpanics.html
